did.unittitle: Henry Augustus Shuteto James A. McGee and Son

scopecontent.p: [Bemoans the avalanche of requests to autograph books he has received; wonders whether he ever autographed and returned the books mentioned in McGee's letter of 2 October [1941]; asks whether these books were sent to him or not.]

did.unittitle: Newspaper clipping of unsigned obituary column for Henry Augustus Shute, headed Boston, 27 Jan [1943]
